positions.name: The Present
positions.description: This card represents the current situation and the energy surrounding the person in the present moment, revealing the essence of the question.

positions.name: The Challenge
positions.description: This card is placed across the first and represents the immediate obstacles or challenges that are creating tension within the self.

positions.name: The Foundation
positions.description: This card shows past influences that continue to affect the current situation, representing the subconscious roots of the matter.

positions.name: The Recent Past
positions.description: This card indicates events or energies that have just passed but still resonate in the present circumstance.

positions.name: Conscious Aims
positions.description: This card represents conscious thoughts, aspirations, and the persona that is presented to the world—the crown of awareness.

positions.name: The Future Unfolding
positions.description: This card shows approaching energies and potential developments that may manifest if the current trajectory continues.

positions.name: The Self
positions.description: This card reflects the querent's attitude toward the situation and how their self-concept is influencing the outcome.

positions.name: External Influence
positions.description: This card reveals external influences, the opinions of others, or the environmental factors affecting the situation—the collective unconscious at work.

positions.name: Hopes and Fears
positions.description: This card reflects the shadow aspects of hopes or fears related to the situation, often showing what is projected from the unconscious.

positions.name: Final Outcome
positions.description: This card shows the probable result if the current course continues, representing the integration of all energies at play.
